title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-12.3 - Reimbursement to districts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-12.3 - Reimbursement to districts

State Regulations

The Office will issue any reimbursement for equivalent
benefits owed to the district with respect to the district having provided such
individual or couple State or locally-funded assistance benefits to cover basic
needs pending the individual's or couple's federal determination of eligibility
for SSI benefits by first determining if the district has been fully reimbursed
through the federal SSI IAR process for such interim assistance provided. If a
deficit remains after the federal payment has been applied, or if there is no
federal SSI IAR payment, the district shall be provided reimbursement from any
retroactive SSP benefits or SSPNA, including benefits owed to a deceased
individual eligible for SSP benefits or SSPNA prior to the date of
death. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-12.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
